name: Goodboi Adventures
description:
Goodboi Adventures is an aborkable game in which you are a dog whose task is to protect its good owners burgers from being stolen by the evil gremlins

CONTROLS:
WASD or ARROW KEYS to move
SPACE to bork!

The game is a mashup of two Atari games, Gremlins and Crossbow, as imagined and executed by  Ewa Leszczewicz and Sophia Haigh.  All assets are original assets.
